title: Add Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy pages with footer links and required acceptance during registration

requirements.text: Create a Terms and Conditions page at route /terms with comprehensive placeholder template text covering standard marketplace terms including user responsibilities, intellectual property rights, payment terms, dispute resolution, and liability disclaimers in a static scrollable format
acceptanceCriteria: New route /terms is accessible and renders the Terms and Conditions page
Page displays comprehensive placeholder text covering marketplace terms
Content is presented in a clean, scrollable format
Template text includes sections for user responsibilities, intellectual property, payment terms, dispute resolution, and liability

requirements.text: Create a Privacy Policy page at route /privacy-policy with comprehensive placeholder template text covering data collection practices, user information usage, cookie policies, third-party services, data security, and user rights in a static scrollable format
acceptanceCriteria: New route /privacy-policy is accessible and renders the Privacy Policy page
Page displays comprehensive placeholder text covering privacy practices
Content is presented in a clean, scrollable format
Template text includes sections for data collection, usage, cookies, third-party services, security, and user rights

requirements.text: Update the Layout component in frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx to include footer links to the Terms and Conditions (/terms) and Privacy Policy (/privacy-policy) pages, ensuring the footer is visible on all pages
acceptanceCriteria: Footer section contains clickable links to /terms and /privacy-policy
Footer is displayed consistently across all pages
Links are styled appropriately and accessible

requirements.text: Add required acceptance checkboxes for Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy to the ProfileSetupModal component in frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModal.tsx, preventing profile creation until both checkboxes are checked
acceptanceCriteria: Two checkboxes are displayed in the profile setup modal for Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
Each checkbox label includes a clickable link to the respective legal page
Submit button is disabled until both checkboxes are checked
Form validation prevents submission without acceptance

requirements.text: Add required acceptance checkboxes for Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy to the ArtistRegistration page in frontend/src/pages/ArtistRegistration.tsx, preventing artist registration until both checkboxes are checked
acceptanceCriteria: Two checkboxes are displayed in the artist registration form for Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
Each checkbox label includes a clickable link to the respective legal page
Submit button is disabled until both checkboxes are checked
Form validation prevents submission without acceptance

requirements.text: Add termsAccepted and privacyPolicyAccepted boolean fields to the UserProfile data model in backend/main.mo to store user acceptance status of legal documents
acceptanceCriteria: UserProfile type includes termsAccepted field of type Bool
UserProfile type includes privacyPolicyAccepted field of type Bool
Backend functions for creating user profiles accept and store these boolean values

requirements.text: Implement backend validation in the createUserProfile and registerAsArtist functions in backend/main.mo to reject profile creation if termsAccepted or privacyPolicyAccepted are false, returning an appropriate error message
acceptanceCriteria: Backend functions validate that both termsAccepted and privacyPolicyAccepted are true
Registration requests with false values for either field are rejected
Clear error messages are returned when validation fails
Existing users are not affected by the new validation

constraints: Do not modify the existing Layout component's header, navigation, or authentication controls
Maintain the existing UserProfile schema structure while adding the new boolean fields
Ensure legal document acceptance is enforced for new registrations without affecting existing users
nonGoals: Implementing actual legal content - only placeholder template text is required
Adding legal document versioning or acceptance tracking beyond boolean flags
Creating admin interfaces to edit Terms and Conditions or Privacy Policy content
Implementing cookie consent banners or GDPR compliance features beyond basic privacy policy
